Reviews.Title: Pure fun!
Reviews.Author: S. Graham "lilbluehouse"
Reviews.Content: This toy camera is highly usable and fun, allowing me to snap photos at will without worrying about using too much film.  It is a half frame camera, so don't plan to enlarge the photos too much or the grain will show, but is great for composing dyptichs, playing, and practicing composition.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful!
Reviews.Author: Moriah Benton
Reviews.Content: This is a lovely camera! It's good for a photography enthusiast who's up for experimenting with 35mm film or a young inexperienced photographer since it's not too pricey or hard to use, but it still produces gorgeous, interesting pictures. I'm already infatuated with mine. :)
